caption: In this episode, a detective story unfolds during a wedding celebration where the detective and his rival collaborate to analyze a murder case. Key points of the narrative include the detective and his rival working together to dissect the murder case. The detective finds the case straightforward and believes he can quickly solve it. The rival appreciates the ambiance of the detective's room, sensing a distinct masculine aura. Both characters demonstrate a penchant for engaging in risky behaviors, like handling firearms. The detective is driven by a desire to uncover the truth. He's indifferent to who might have killed the bride, his focus solely lies on the actual truth of the matter. In a twist, it's revealed that the bride had once committed suicide but subsequently appeared to have come back to life, a scenario the detective deems impossible.
